newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Gencor busy as overseas investor buys in.
newsitem.headline: Gencor busy as overseas investor buys in.

text.p: South Africa's Gencor Ltd was busy in early trade on Friday after a large corporate finance deal boosted volumes in the stock, dealers said.
By 0800 GMT the firm's share was down five cents at 20.50 rand, but volumes touched 3.30 million shares worth about 67.9 million rand, making it by far the busiest stock on the bourse.
About 3.2 million of the shares had been traded overnight in a single corporate finance deal by ING Barings, dealers said.
Market sources said the deal had been with an overseas investor.
